titleStmt.title: Well Drilling Rig Kept on the Go

bibl.title: Well Drilling Rig Kept on the Go
Untitled
Lake Andes Wave

div1.p: W. W. Verner who just recently completed a contract of erecting a set of farm buildings and putting down a well, south of Delmont, informs us he has moved his well outfit to the John O'Connor farm, where they will repair the well. Mr. Verner and his well drilling rig are kept on the go all the time and those wishing his services usually have to put in their bids ahead of time.
